actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Committee on Labor and Human Resources requested executive comment from Department of Health and Human Services.

official_title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act that a student enrolled in a graduate program in psychology shall be eligible for student loans under the health professions student loan program.

summary.text: Amends the Public Health Service Act to make students enrolled in graduate programs in psychology eligible for student loans under the health professions student loan program.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act that a student enrolled in a graduate program in psychology shall be eligible for student loans under the health professions student loan program.
